Title: Tit Punch
Plot: After insulting the food in front of the prison chef, Piper is starved out by the kitchen staff and struggles to offer up an acceptable apology.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, nudity, sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Danielle Brooks, Laverne Cox, Joel Marsh Garland, Annie Golden, Natasha Lyonne, Matt Peters, Elizabeth Rodriguez, Nick Sandow, Yael Stone
